name: Contact ME (itch)
description:
Thanks to BRACKEYS for the idea............It's a classic Arcade Style Game.

The Game is a simple straight forward evade and escape type. It's a mod over hyper casual games and relaxing game.

LEt's see who can beat my highscore of 257!!!!!

Also the game is supported with joystick........!!!!

THE GAME FEATURES A RANDOM GENERATION OF BLOCKS THAT YOU HAVE TO EVADE AND HAS A INFINITY STAGES.........MORE IMPROVEMENTS ARE COMING SOON......

Music Credits : https://bensound.org
